title: gazebo-current depends on libsdformat-dev, but ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins depends on sdformat

content.raw:
Trying to install drcsim via:
```
apt-get install drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-ros (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
          Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: sdformat but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Depends: libsdformat1 (= 1.4.10-1~precise) but it is not going to be installed
                   Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

```
apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
 libsdformat1 : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
```

Trying to install drcsim via:

apt-get install drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-ros (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
          Depends: ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins (>= 2.4.0) but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: sdformat but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install gazebo-current sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 drcsim : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
 ros-groovy-gazebo-ros : Depends: gazebo-current but it is not going to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Depends: libsdformat1 (= 1.4.10-1~precise) but it is not going to be installed
                   Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.

apt-get install gazebo-current libsdformat-dev libsdformat1  sdformat ros-groovy-gazebo-ros ros-groovy-gazebo-plugins drcsim

The following packages have unmet dependencies:
 libsdformat-dev : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
 libsdformat1 : Conflicts: sdformat but 1.4.9-1~precise is to be installed
E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages.
